title: New: Angel Haze – On The Edge
body:
Bitch.

Bitch.Bitch. Jesus, it’s only the 3rd of January, my body chemistry is still all over the fucking place and the last thing I want to hear is two MC’s squabbling. For the record, I’m with [Angel Haze](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18719-new-angel-haze-shit-i-dont-like/ "New: Angel Haze – Shit I Don’t Like"), but only because [Azealia Banks](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/16927-new-azealia-banks-aquababe-produced-by-machinedrum/ "New: Azealia Banks – Aquababe (Produced by Machinedrum)") hasn’t responded yet. In conclusion, I couldn’t give less of a fuck. Apparently a twitter war is going on as we speak. AS WE SPEAK??? What the hell are you doing on CitR, go and check it out immediately.

For the record, I’m with Angel Haze, but only because Azealia Banks hasn’t responded yet. In conclusion, I couldn’t give less of a fuck. Apparently \[…\]
